name: Mainblades Inspections
goal: Developing a drone solution to perform aircraft inspections. We greatly reduce down time of an airplane by the use of an automated drone. We mainly focus on non scheduled inspections such as lightning strikes.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: unmanned aviation laws. We would like to make it possible to fly with a drone in civil Control Regions (CTR's).
